org.jclif.type
Class CommandLineProperties

java.lang.Object
  org.jclif.type.CommandLineProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class CommandLineProperties
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

This class serves as container of command line related properties used for parsing like option prefix and option-parameter character delimiter.

Author:
Stephen Lou Banal <stephen.banal@gmail.com>

Constructor Detail

CommandLineProperties

public CommandLineProperties(java.lang.String optionPrefix,
                             java.lang.String optionLongPrefix,
                             java.lang.String optionParameterDelim)
Creates a new instance of command line properties.

Parameters:
optionPrefix - prefix used in command line options
optionLongPrefix - prefix used in command line input options in long format
optionParameterDelim - delimiter string used between an option and its parameter
